tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: *** ** *** **** ******* ******* very tranquil and not crowded place. *** ********** ** *** **** ************ * **** **** ********** ***** He was able to understand my concerns and problems that I had, he himself took ECHO test for me and suggested the lifestyle changes I needed to bring about also he is one of those rare doctors who wouldn't prescribe any medicine for no purpose, rather he advised on making changes on food habits and lifestyle changes to keep the heart healthy. He also asked to stop taking a medicine which I was taking from a long time as it deemed unnecessary (unfortunately the previous doctor I checked failed to advise me the same so I continued taking the tablet for couple of years for no reason, & I regret it). I would advise anybody wanting to have a thorough conversation and cardiac check-up must visit this clinic.

I have paid 850rs as consultation fee *** *** ********* ******* **** ***** * *****I have take my mom who is 52 with all the reports of health check up. ** ******* **** **** ******* *** ******* the reports already include thyroid, echo, ecg. but he again asking us to do, I told him the same already there but he told they are related to some other tests which is totally wrong. I didn't even feel like completing the consultationmanipal hospital ** **** ** **** ** **** ** ******** ***** **** ****** ******
